errors.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Try to reload page

validation.exactly_error: Field $t({{ field }}) must be exactly {{ length }} characters
validation.max_error: $t({{ field }}) must be at most {{ max }} characters
validation.min_error: $t({{ field }}) must be at least {{ min }} characters

room_creation_error: Something went wrong. Try again later

blocked_permissions.title: Your system is blocking camera or microphone access
blocked_permissions.step_one: In your System Settings open “Privacy & Security” tab
blocked_permissions.step_two: Enable Camera and Microphone access for this browser

camera_in_use_explanation: Another application (Zoom, Teams) or browser tab (Google Meet, Messenger Video) might already be using your camera. Please turn off other applications that might be using your camera, before proceeding.

device_permissions_description_items.chrome_first: Press the lock icon next to the address in browser’s address bar <Icon />

devices_access_explanation: It seems that we cannot access camera and microphone permissions. For others to see and hear you, you will need to enable permissions manually.
permissions_explanation: For others to see and hear you, your browser will request access to your camera and microphone. You can still turn them back off at any time
press_allow_to_turn_on_access: Press Allow to turn on access
press_allow_to_turn_on_access_desc: You will be able to turn off microphone and camera access at any time you want.
terms_checkbox_guest_full: I freely consent to Meedio (the data controller) collecting my personal data, which includes: name and IP-address. This data will be collected for the purpose of offering the video communication service. The data will be used for tasks such as establishing a video and audio stream, connecting you to other room participants, and troubleshooting. I am aware that I can revoke this consent at any time in the future without stating any reasons, by sending an email to <email>we@meedio.me</email>, about the withdrawal of consent for the processing of my personal data I have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, and data portability (Articles 15-21 of the General Data Protection Regulation), as well as the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority (Article 77 of the General Data Protection Regulation). The data protection officer of Meedio can be contacted at <email>we@meedio.me</email>. For further information see <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
terms_checkbox_guest: I freely consent to Meedio (the data controller) processing my personal data, i.e. name and IP-address, with the purpose of establishing a video room. I am aware that I can revoke my consent at any time. For more information see <expand>Full Text</expand> or <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
terms_checkbox: I have read and agree to <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
could_not_change_the_camera: Could not change the camera device

blur.safari_disabled: This feature is disabled in Safari for now.
blur.unsupported_browser_explanation: Meedio's visual effects use web technologies that your browser doesn't support. Use a <browser>supported browser</browser>.
blur.unsupported_browser: This browser doesn't support visual effects
blur.unsupported: Blur is not supported in your browser

waiting_for_permissions: Waiting for microphone and camera permissions
blur_level_error: Can not change blur level. Try again later
effects_cam_off: Your camera is turned off. Selecting an effect will turn it on
you_can_enable_or_disable_your_microphon: You can enable or disable your microphone.
preview_cam_off: Turn on the camera to see a preview
you_can_enable_or_disable_your_camera: You can enable or disable your camera.
effects_explanation: You can add blur to your video.
hide_tiles_description: You can hide shared screens. It will still be visible to other users.

screenshare.screen_record_alert: Your browser might not have screen-recording permission on your computer. Go to <preferences>System Preferences</preferences>.
screenshare.screen_sharing_error: Sorry, an error has occurred when screen sharing.

appointment_title: Share link to start a meeting
share_link: Just copy a link or share to other platforms
cannot_join_room: Cannot join room. Try again later
name: Name
room_id_description: A Matrix room ID is a unique code that identifies a specific room in the Matrix network, similar to a phone number for that room. For example: <bold>!abcdef12345:matrix.org</bold>
import_failed_title: The app couldn’t find or load a part it needed.
import_failed_subtitle: Please try refreshing the page or navigating to main page
are_you_sure_ban: Are you sure you want to ban <bold>{{ name }}</bold> from the room?
are_you_sure_kick: Are you sure you want to kick <bold>{{ name }}</bold> from the room?
disconnected_from_the_room_description: It seems that your internet connection was lost and you were disconnected from the room. Please try to join again.
duplicate_room_join_detected: You've joined this room from another tab or device. This session is terminated.
end_call_title: Are you sure you want to leave <bold>{{ room }}</bold>?
mail_body_invitation: I would like to invite you to my Meedio room at
mic_cam_off_notification: Join room with microphone and camera off
participant_banned: You were banned from the room. Please contact the responsible person.
participant_kicked: You were kicked from the room. Please contact the responsible person.
participant_was_not_banned: The participant was not banned from the room.
participant_was_not_kicked: The participant was not kicked out of the room.
room_join_error: Could not connect to a room. Try again later.
rooms_subtitle: Create new room and invite guests
you_can_join_back: You can join to the room again.
unsupported_browser_explanation: To enjoy full Meedio experience try updating your current browser or download the latest version of recommended browser.
participant_was_not_accepted: The participant was not allowed to join into the room.
are_you_sure_deny: Are you sure you want to deny <bold>{{ name }}</bold> from entering into the room?
you_were_denied_to_join_the_room: You were denied from entering into the room. Please contact the room owner.
current_waiting_list: You are currently in waiting list
could_not_toggle_waiting_list: Could not toggle waiting list. Please try again later.
could_not_find_room: Could not update waiting list. Room was not found
could_not_invite_user_to_room: Could not invite user {{displayName}} to the room
could_not_join_the_room: Could not join the room. Please try again later
waiting_list_empty: Currently waiting list is empty. Share meeting url and invite more participants
room_alias_explanation: You can set a custom room name with an auto-generated ID to make it unique
alias_not_available: Room alias <bold>{{ alias }}</bold> is not available
must_match_pattern: $t({{ field }}) field should contain only numbers and letters
description_placeholder: Enter room description, you can specify what is it about and so on...
leave_room_explanation: Are you sure you want to leave this room?
room_deleted_explanation: The room has been deleted or not found
invalid_homeserver_url: Homeserver URL is invalid, please use valid Matrix homeserver
delegated_oidc_compatibility_unsupported: Delegated OIDC compatibility is not supported on this homeserver
sso_login_failed: Login failed, please try again later.
video_playback_error: Sorry, we are unable to play this video. Your browser might not support the required video codecs or features. Please try using a different browser or ensure that your current browser is up to date.

feedback.title_question: How was the quality of the meeting?
feedback.privacy_policy: We may use your data for personalization, innovation, research and other purposes described in our <element>Privacy Policy</element>
feedback.diagnostics: Check our dedicated <element>Diagnostics page</element> to try to detect where the issue could be
feedback.cant_see_participants: I was not able to see other participants
feedback.camera_no_work: I was not able to get my camera to work
feedback.audio_not_working: I was not able to hear other participants
feedback.microphone_no_work: I was not able to get my microphone to work
feedback.participants_cannot_join: Someone was not able to join the meeting
feedback.device_slowdown: Device was slow during the call
feedback.disconnects: I was dropped from the call

cant_open_account_management: Failed to open the account settings page. Please try again later.
profile_picture_explanation: Maximum size 1200x1200, PNG or JPEG formats.
display_name_explanation: Name will be seen by everyone.
failed_to_update_display_name: Failed to update profile name, please try again later.
display_name_too_long: Name is too long, maximum length is {{maxLength}}
account_management_explanation: This will open a new page in your browser, where you can securely manage your data
error_uploading_avatar: Error occured while uploading avatar, please try again later
diagnostics_description: Run our diagnostics tool to know where could the issue be.

diagnostics_descriptions.video_output: Can receive and display a video feed?

screen_sharing_test_description: We are about to run a screen share test. A browser prompt will appear asking you to choose a screen or window to share. Simply select the screen or window you want to share.
diagnostics_page_confirmation_descriptio: You are about to be navigated to the <bold>diagnostics page</bold>. Do you wish to continue?
we_found_some_issues: We found some issues. Please check the recommendations on how to fix them.
web_view_explanation: In order for Meedio to work properly, please open link in your browser. Press 3 dots on the top-right corner and select “Open in browser“
loading_longer_than_usual: Page is loading longer than usual
no_device_description: Check if your {{deviceType}} is connected. If it isn't, plug one in. You might need to restart your browser.
meedio_open_in_another_window: Meedio is open in another window
click_continue_to_disconnect_from_window: Click "Continue" to disconnect the other window and use Meedio here.
no_results_text: Unfortunately we could not find any rooms.
tab_released: Meedio is connected in another window
close_this_window_now: This window can now be closed, or refresh to take over control here
try_reloading_the_page: Try reloading the page, or close other windows.
already_connected_to_room: You are already connected to <bold>{{roomName}}</bold> with another device or browser.
email_is_already_added: This email address has already been added
discard_unsaved_changes_description: If you discard, all the information you’ve inserted will be lost and room will not be created
not_invited_to_room: You are not invited to this room
waiting_for_other_participants_desc: The meeting will begin once other participants join
only_one_feature_active: Only one feature can be active at a time
